document.full_text: yasmina reza, who has a new play out, does not have a web site, blog or twitter account. 'after i write,' she said, 'i have nothing to say.'
document.title: celebrated playwright who resists celebrity
lines_and_colors: yasmina reza, who has a new play out, does not have a web site, blog or twitter account. 'after i write,' she said, 'i have nothing to say.'
